text: Quentin Halys was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Blaž Rola won the title after defeating Ramkumar Ramanathan 6–2, 6–7(6–8), 7–5 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Tallahassee Tennis Challenger - Singles 2017 Singles Tallahassee Tennis Challenger – Singles Tallahassee Tennis Challenger – Singles
title: 2017 Tallahassee Tennis Challenger – Singles
